website_summaries.verdict: Affordable, powerful, and packed with a range of useful features, this banana-yellow car tire pump is well worth your consideration.
pros: 11-foot cord allows easy access to all tires
cons: A little on the noisy side

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: When I gave this product 1 Star, the site wouldn’t let my phone take a pic or video. Anyway....... I really was excited to have one of these. However, not so much after adding 4 lbs. of air to one car tire. It then QUIT! And It has not worked since. I’m a busy person (who isn’t!!) and don’t have time to return about 1/2 the products I buy on Amazon. I hope everyone else that’s giving this the 5 Star reviews are being truthful, so fewer of us waste time and money on things that don’t last. I give excellent reviews for good products. And always tell the Truth! Big Ed
customer_reviews.author: Big Bobby Edward

customer_reviews.title: The tire inflator is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: it works very well. inflate speed is fast. It has s digital display of the current pressure. very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Chenyang Xu

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your car kit
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to use once you read the instructions and try it out. Set the pressure. Finishes blinking. Press the power. It stops by itself. The cable is long. It's great. Doesn't circle the car, but it is long enough to easily reach. I hope I don't have real reason to use it outside of pressure maintenance. But if I do at least I know it works very well. Works on a lot of stuff I suppose thanks to the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Herman White

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't  order again.
customer_reviews.text: I had this about a week before I finally decided to try it . It was around 7:30 pm and I put air in one of my tires. Mosquitoes were biting me so I decided to check my other tires the next morning. Around 11am the next morning I plugged it in same as the night before and it wouldn't start. That is pitiful! I used it one time and in less than 24 hours I tried to use again and it wouldn't start. I sent it back that same day. I would not recommend this. Will NOT order again.👎👎👎
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: The unit straight up did not work. This particular VacLife fails at the point where you set your desired pressure and then wait for the flashing to stop. The flashing stops but the selected pressure is not retained and appears to go down to the actual pressure of the tire (My check of the tire pressure showed 30 PSI needing an inflation to 36 PSI-When the flashing stopped my set pressure of 36 PSI went down to 29.5 PSI). Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Brannon

customer_reviews.title: Worked when tested but died when we needed it.  Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Worked briefly and then died. We tested it briefly and it worked, but when we actually needed to use it, it died. You only have 30 days to return it, but it's an emergency item. By the time we found out it is worthless, it's too late to return it. Buy something from a reputable manufacturer with a solid warranty. It's not worth saving a few bucks to end up stranded in a time of need.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. Has worked 1/3 times
customer_reviews.text: Highly not recommended. Just doesn't work. Seems like the sensor after you afix it to your tire is defective. Only worked the first time I used it. Hasn't since. Trash product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Eilers

customer_reviews.title: Completely Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: This pump was working great, but then suddenly stopped working. I simply plugged in in one day and no lights came on at all. I checked the 12V source in my car and that wasn't the problem. The pump simply broke after 2 short months of casual use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after <8 uses.
customer_reviews.text: I had this product for a few months before I used it just got it as a back up in case I had a flat. Iused it a few times when I start getting a low tire probably less than eight times and then it quit working it turns on but it won’t inflate so my opinion waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Katfer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Received the product and it won't turn on at all. I plugged it into my outlet in my car to no avail and my outlet worked just fine with my phone charger amongst other things. Irritating to purchase something that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Chilson

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY GET A BETTER ONE
customer_reviews.text: At first it worked great and used it twice for my Car and mountain Bike but then again I don't usually have flat tires and this weekend my Mountain bike got a flat tire then when I used it to inflate my new tube I noticed that the digital tire pressure gage display starts going up then went down and air starts coming out of the hose on where it attached to the machine then it came out due to pressure...( See Pictures) Disappointed because I cant returned it nor exchanged it because I missed it by 7 days till they allow or accept return.
customer_reviews.author: wakab

customer_reviews.title: STOP WORKING
customer_reviews.text: Stop working after 5 days......I have to return it .Really disappointed with that
customer_reviews.author: sherman lee

customer_reviews.title: Great for 14 tire inflation, then dead.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to inflate tires after off roading. Used three times (12 tires), then died after filling two of four tires. Light still works, setting panel still works, but no pump motor. Cord gets to all tires, light is functional, quality and longevity are major fails.
customer_reviews.author: J.D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE less than 30 days old and it is broken in half.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: less than 1 month of normal use, the air line has broken off the pump. thank you Amazon for the return i WILL NOT get another one. Works well. inflates as it should. It does get rather hot if you are airing up multiple tires. DO NOT buy this for its gauge as it is wrong. WAY WRONG. It over inflated 8 tires between 5-8 psi per tire. Make sure you purchase a quality gauge if you purchase this inflator. Other than that, its fine.
customer_reviews.author: Usdcrs

customer_reviews.title: If you are having trouble (as I did) please read this review; it may help
customer_reviews.text: I gave this thing a 1-star review a while back and I've now changed it to 4-stars. Turns out that I initially couldn't get the compressor to run under a load (ie, as soon as I hooked up the Vaclife to the tire valve it stopped running). Last nite I considered the possiblilty that my 12v lighter in my car was not producing enough volts so I took the Vac to my 18-wheeler (which has 4 Trump batteries), cranked up the rig, plugged in the compressor and it worked great. So, in conclusion, I figure some autos don't have enough juice to power this thing.
customer_reviews.author: triple g man

customer_reviews.title: No thank you
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions that came with it to a "T". It did inflate a soccer ball, but it does not work at all after that first time. The light doesn't go on, the machine will not turn on, it may be that it blew a fuse as the instruction manual does warn if it runs for more than a small amount of time that is possible. It comes with an extra fuse, but I am not going to take it apart and put in a new fuse after the first 5 minute use. Can't rely on something like that for a tire in an emergency. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Much quicker and quieter than my older unit
customer_reviews.text: So first of all the unit came much quicker than expected. Super happy about that. This unit is much quieter that my old unit which makes quite a bit of noise. Seems to inflate slightly quicker than the other one as well. I’ve only used it twice so far but pretty happy with the purchase. Set up was fairly easy and using it is the same as any other. So it’s pretty straight forward. I like the fact that’s it’s bright yellow so you know exactly where it is. Highly recommended purchase
customer_reviews.author: rylee and maile

customer_reviews.title: Used Twice
customer_reviews.text: Used twice. First, was an experimental evaluation when I first received the unit. Verified that it stopped after filling up the tire after an extra .5 PSI. Second was going around my travel trailer and pumping each tire up to 60 PSI. After the Second tire, the display faded away to black and could no longer get power to work on the item after trying on 3 vehicles and a jump starter with a 12v DC port.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: will not inflate to 52 psi.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my motorcycle. 42psi in the front, and 52 psi in the rear. Worked fine on front, but wouldn't even attempt to inflate to 52 psi. I had only 43 psi on my rear tire, hooked up the power, clipped on the valve stem, set my range for 52 psi, pressed the inflate button....and after one second, nothing...nada, I mean nothing. no lights, not a growl or anything. I checked the fuse, still good. Thermal breaker shutoff is what happened. It simply will not attempt to fill at that level. Junk to me....nope! I do NOT recommend it unless you just want to inflate toys under 40 psi....
customer_reviews.author: Roadie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing more than a yellow brick that waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest hunk of junk I have ever got, I can't even believe Amazon sells this brick. Amazon should be ashamed of letting the seller get away with putting this system. It inflates absolutely nothing not a bicycle tire definitely not a car tire maybe a pool toy slowly, I bought this in case of emergency, emergency came useless. I bought this and I put it in the back of my truck in Hope that I would never have to use it but eventualities happen and I was surprised to be let down like that. Do not buy do not waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Lovesexy

customer_reviews.title: Set the desired pressure before you start.
customer_reviews.text: These extra instructions are emailed AFTER your purchase. Why not just be upfront and tell this in the item details/description?
customer_reviews.author: Treven Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Light and Quite compressor
customer_reviews.text: I got this air compressor as a replacement to my old compressor which was broken. Pros: light weight, sturdy, silent, digital guage. Cons: There's a variation of 0.5 psi but that shouldn't matter much. The cord should also be tucked into the compressor like my old slime compressor. I like the way it pumps 0.5 psi more than the set pressure to account for the pressure loss during the removal of nozzle. I always rely on my ANSI certified pressure guage to check the tire pressure and I was surprised that this guage is well within 0.5psi error which shouldn't affect the tire much as it's better to inflate 1 psi more than the factory recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Krish

customer_reviews.title: It was good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: For the first week that I owned it, it worked very well and I liked how it has a storage inside to store the cables so it doesn’t look sloppy. When I was unplugging the unit from the 12 colt adapter the piece that gets connected broke, I didn’t pull hard but I know the quality isn’t the greatest so I had no choice but to throw it away. I really wish the handles were you plug it in was built better. Worked good while it lasted
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy to use...
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned one of these air compressor tire inflators before, so I'm by no means an expert on them. That said, I am quite pleased with this unit, which succeeded in filling the tires of two bicycles and a trailer with the correct amount of air without any problems. I have yet to use it on my car or truck. It's a bit noisy when operating, but that is a minor inconvenience. It is lightweight and doesn't take up much space in the trunk of a car. Some kind of storage case for the unit and the accessories would have been nice, so I had to improvise and used an old gym bag instead.
customer_reviews.author: David Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome device and very easy to use. You plug it into the car outlet, turn your car on. Then connect the air hose to the tire, select the measurement and hit the power button. It will shut off automatically when it reaches the predetermined measurement. This filled my tire which was at 24 PSI to 35 PSI in a matter of minutes. Also, the instructions are listed on a sticker on top of the device. The cord is long enough to reach all of your tires and there is a light if you need illumination while using. Overall, a great product that I am very pleased with and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ThinkPink

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and assembled! Won’t last the test of time. Air hose gets extremely hot and disconnects from base. Overheats and will probably blowout your port fuse! Takes way too long to inflate tires...
customer_reviews.author: Big Ben Marquez

customer_reviews.title: I needed this!!
customer_reviews.text: I have several bikes that I had been using an old manual pump to blow up the tires. Well that old pump broke leaving me with no way to inflate my tires before a bike ride. I bought this specifically for the bikes but I can see that this little air compressor would be handy on road trips for those emergency situations. I like the display and the psi reading seems to be accurate. The cigarette plug charger is okay but I plan on getting an adapter for it so it can plug into the wall as well. I have been asking myself why I didn't buy one of these sooner! Its a definite must to have in the garage!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Never pay for air again...
customer_reviews.text: Where I live, most gas stations charge money to use the air machines... I will never have to do that again. This machine is really convenient. It plugs right into your car's power source and you can use it to top off your tires to the exact PSI you need. This is small and compact, so you can keep it in your car for whenever you need it, perfect for an emergency as well. Great value for a piece of mind to never need to pay for compressed air again.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W.

customer_reviews.title: Great little fast air compressor to fill up your small items.
customer_reviews.text: I have an old truck I use for trash hauling and picking up rock and dirt for my home projects all four tires have slow leaks and decided to try this out since I get tired of pulling out the big air compressor and waking the neighborhood up. It worked great accurate psi reading and noticed it even had a light great for when you're stuck in the dark. It's a great handy little thing for quick fill-ups of your summer toys in the pool or lake for the kids and basketballs. I love it so far. I should have done a review as soon as I used but waited and tried some other things before I wrote this.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Pump works, gauge doesn’t....see update
customer_reviews.text: Just got the product in today and I filled two tires and everything worked like it should. My tires only needed 2 psi, so this was just a function check of the device. Third tire read 32 psi so I set it for 35 and let the pump start working. Gauge started to go down and read 28 psi and kept going. This went on for about a minute or so and I manually stopped it. Rechecked the psi and it was at 42 psi!! Pump works but do not trust the pressure gauge. Update 7/18/2020 Opened up the second compressor which worked as advertised....once. Will not turn back on. Will be returning both for a refund. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gamer in SA

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, so can't speak to it's functionality, but it seems to be sturdy and built to last. the cord is plenty long to reach all the tires on my CRV. Took one point off because, although there is a space inside the unit for the air hose, the cord doesn't fit into the unit and this doesn't come with a case. It's also nearly impossible to fit it back into the box it came in. Their customer service is very responsive though and they offer a lifetime warranty. Will update my review after I've had a chance to use the compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUST NEED IN AN EMERGENCY
customer_reviews.text: After buying this as an as needed kit for my tires for emergency use only. I had to finally use it. I hit 2 huge pot holes and my tire pressure gauge alerted me that my tires were only 26 PSI! Instead of the normal 35 PSI. I checked and examine my tires to see if it had punctured, from the looks of it there was none. So I used this product. IT WAS EXCELLENT. It has a built in tire pressure reader and then you can set it to the wanted tire pressure then it inflates then it auto stops once it reached the goal PSI you set. Truly a must have if you are a car owner.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonKisnik

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works well
customer_reviews.text: This product is great to keep in the car to top off a tire or inflate a flat tire enough to get you to a gas station to have it repaired. The digital tire gauge is accurate (I compared it to a calibrated tire gauge) and I really like that you can set the tire pressure you want and it’ll automatically stop when it reaches that pressure amount. This air compressor is very small so I’ll keep it in the car all the time for emergencies and the convenience of being able to top off the tire pressure whenever I want.
customer_reviews.author: The Average Consumer

customer_reviews.title: So quick!
customer_reviews.text: The one I had been using would take 10+ minutes to put 20 PSI in the tire, but this thing is so quick! It was shocking to watch how quickly the tire filled. I had all four tires back to where they should be in less than 15 minutes. I didn't think that was possible from such a tiny machine. Haven't used the light, so I can't judge that, but it filled my car tires with the quickness, and the automatic shut off feature and being able to program in the desired PSI are amazing, too! I didn't think I could be this excited about an air compressor...
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This product is just Amazing! I would like to give over 5stars! Even though my tire pressure was low, I always waited until I go to the shop for oil change or tire rotation. If I really had to fill up the air, I had to go to gas station and worry about what if tire blows out, due to can’t see the numbers at the gas station air station. Now, since I have this amazing product, I don’t have to go through this issue again. My, and Wife car tires going to be full of airs all the time.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to use tire inflator
customer_reviews.text: This product has saved me multiple times. Prior to this I had an air compressor I had to turn on to let it fill with air, which probably took a process of 20-30 minutes to fill all tires. Also, super loud device. But then I found this VacLife product and I would like to say its 100x better! Super quiet and really takes less than a minute to get about 6 PSI. Very convenient to have in the car for emergency situations. The cord length is super long, so I don't see any issues about that for any car, unless you have a super lengthy car, like a limo
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it would do.
customer_reviews.text: My wife's tire pressure light was coming on, even after I'd paid for air to refill the tires. Boy, do I HATE paying for air. So, the answer was to purchase a pump. I used to have a 120v pump, but we've moved and I no longer have access to AC power. Looking at all of the available 12v pumps, the VacLife compressor looked neat and offered nice features - the automatic shutoff being one. So, I purchased it and went to refill her tires...but being a newer car, the challenge became finding the 12v socket. Once that was done, the pump performed exactly as promised...what a delight. Couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless item. Error code all the time.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this item some months ago. And not used it usually may be just 4 times on event, but it turn to useless and show error code all the time can’t pump it on. I try to contact to seller and i got the responses may be i not turn my car on or something else with the vent??? I’m not stupid like that men, of cause i turn my car on before plug in the power for the pump. Anyway it’s useless and the seller don’t want to support you. Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Lucia

customer_reviews.title: This little Compressor rocks!
customer_reviews.text: first things first 1. This is compact 2. This thing works, not at the same speed your local shop's Compressor will work but this is meant to be kept in car to be used when needed. 3. Not much noise. 4. Auto Shut off feature is great 5 Additional nozzles for other uses(like for football etc) is a plus. 6 Cord length is sufficient What can be improved 1. I would have liked if it had a rechargeable port also, but then I am asking for too much at this price point In the end would say you need this in the car like you need a jump starter battery.
customer_reviews.author: rkris

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: This works great for me. I bought it because a good bike pump is around $30. I used it to fill my bike tires and then topped off my car tires and it was perfect. My car has tire reading so it matched the setting. To pump a bike you have to have your car running but it seems worth it. Not as loud as I thought and it is very compact. I see other ones out there for much more but if you just want to fill up your tires periodically this is great. I didn't see the 50 psi limit but I am ok with that. You may want to check.
customer_reviews.author: RTS

customer_reviews.title: Great little compressor!
customer_reviews.text: Got this mainly to fill up my horse trailer tires because they get low occasionally. I was surprised how small this compressor is and worried it would take a long time to air up the tires. It's actually pretty quick. for a full air up from 0 to 36 PSI it took about 10 mins or so. Not bad for completely deflated tire. I love that you can set the exact PSI you desire (there are also other measurements you can select). I didn't notice it overheating at all when filling up either. Definitely recommend one of these to keep in your car in case you need to fill up a tire or two.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. We at first ordered the hand pumps for the bike but it wasn’t working, it only hurt our hand. Save yourself the trouble and spend a little more and buy this machine. The light that came with it was nice and bright. We only wished it came with a case because the accessories that came with it could be easily lost. There is also no start/stop button, only on or off. The cord also bulges out with no where to put it. We wish there was a pocket to tie the cord somewhere so it’s not just sticking out on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love These Things
customer_reviews.text: These portable air compressors that you can keep in your car are so convenient when you travel a lot. I can top off my tires before every trip and I never have to worry about finding air at a gas station. I had one of these from another brand and the sleeving started to leak after a year or so, so I'm hoping this one holds up a little better. The 2-year warranty definitely gives me some peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan H.

customer_reviews.title: Verify accuracy before trusting.
customer_reviews.text: First one I received read about 4 PSI higher than my 2 other gauges and car. Received a replacement which is now right in the same range as everything else. I would verify yours reads accurately before I'd trust it. Unknown brand is always a risk. Hopefully they'll actually still be around in a couple years if warranty service is ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on Friday night and received in just two days on Sunday morning. Fast service. The product itself is very good for the price paid. Does the job very well. The onboard pressure meter is also accurate. The overall built quality is good. I would 100% recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaqib

customer_reviews.title: Great compressor, better price
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products that you didn’t know you needed until you have it. For someone like me that doesn’t have a garage, I’m typically paying at the gas station for an air fill. This little compressor does a great job, but does more than just fill your tires. Comes with extra tips and attachments to fit most things. Plus, with a little ingenuity, can fill camping mattresses as well. Small firm factor makes storage in the car easy and the handy light is great for pumping air in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Guess I got a lemon
customer_reviews.text: Liked so much about this product but it stopped working after 3 or 4 times. Amazon replaced it. I assumed I got a lemon so got the same product again. About the same time frame as the original one, I went to attach to the tire of my wheel barrel and the air line /hose came off in my hand...completely broken from the body. Could not find a way to repair and the return time frame went from the first one so it could not be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Very useful device for any garage or trunk!
customer_reviews.text: With four cars, seven bikes and piles of inflatable things in our household, this is a really very useful device! I've been using and testing it all week to see how it behaves and I'm amazed to say the least, how well it works and how extremely easy to handle! In just two or three easy steps, the required air pressure is set, a button is pressed and you're done ... wait a while until the tire is inflated. Very low noise, almost no vibration, long enough cable and hose, large and easy to see and operate display ... what more could a person want !? I sincerely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Genius!
customer_reviews.text: I used this as soon as I got it on a problem tire I haven’t been able to have checked yet. This is the coolest little air pump! It so easy to use, I only need the directions on the sticker on the device itself, I didn’t need the instructions to work it! You set the pressure and turn it on. Turns off automatically! Tire gauge is accurate! Love this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile and Compact
customer_reviews.text: The VacLife portable air compressor is named for what exactly it is about. It is portable, lightweight, and doesn't look like a traditional 'pump'. Had neighbors checking it out this AM when I filled up two of my tires. Had it set to 39.5 psi. Once it reached the dialed-in pressure I turned it off and used a calibrated tire pressure gauge. It was off slightly by 0.5 psi. I think I took too long to disconnect the nozzle head from the Schrader valve. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Tae C.

customer_reviews.title: piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: was a gift used for first time one day after return window closed and it ran for 30 seconds then died. tried to connect with web site for return and was not able to connect. whole thing seems like a phishing scam. better off at an auto parts store for these item. Amazon getting very sloppy with its suppliers
customer_reviews.author: THsr

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to always have one in your car
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very easy to use! Compact yet powerful. Digital display, units selection, and auto-power off are great features. Was able to fill an empty bicycle tire to full 40 psi in around 30 secs. Good design to tuck away the pump cable and comes with a built-in light. Also comes with attachments for a ball and inflatables so perfect to bring to your weekend getaways for biking, camping or to the beach. Haven’t tested on a flat tire yet, but I’m confident because I have this tucked away in the trunk ready when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndon

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Quick, and Added Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: As a female I like the peace of mind knowing if my tire pressure gets low and I'm not close to home, I can inflate my tires in a matter of minutes. I used it on my escape the day it was delivered for a slow leak in one of my back tires. It was fast and accurate, I checked it with my tire gauge before and after using the vaclife air compressor. Also I like that it comes with a nice length warranty, as items like this hopefully are not needed on a daily basis!
customer_reviews.author: Grace D.

customer_reviews.title: The auto psi feature is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this automated tire inflator because my BMW was low on air on all sides. In the past I had an inflator that would not show PSI, so I had to have a separate psi measure stick, was very cumbersome. But with this magical inflator, I simply set it to the correct psi and then went around the car. The inflator did it all by itself. I double checked pressure later manually, and the tires were all inflated to the correct psi. I used it yesterday, and can only say it's the perfect little machine!
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Blew apart during first use
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. In my first use (inflating trailer tires about 3psi each) the unit and hose became hot then exploded apart in a burst of air and smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: Convenient tire inflator
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the best tire inflator in terms of value and ease of use . Love that it has a digital gauge where you can actually set the psi - I had an old one that had a meter and you had to kind of take it out at the right time and hope that it was inflated properly - this one is much simpler . Also has a long enough cord length that reaches from my outlet to my tire and the light is a bonus when inflating at night . It’s a no brainer purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jay C.

customer_reviews.title: So Easy even an old lady can do it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. I read the instructions and got my tires inflated. In case you're wondering. This is the easy way 1. Start the car. It must be running. 2. Plug into your 12 v socket in the car. I have an SUV so i have a few 3. Snap onto the air plug on the tire 4. Set your correct pressure. 5. Press start. It will stop when the tire is inflated to the pressure you selected. I checked this on the menu in the dashboard of my car. Repeat for the other tires.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love This Thing!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the better Amazon purchases I've made lately. After spending much time comparing different compressors, I chose the VacLife 701YE Inflator based on reviews, features, and price. Very happy. The VacLife is like night and day compared to my previous portable compressor. The VacLife inflates tires to pressure like 10 times faster than my older portable compressor plus the auto-shutoff feature means I don't have to babysit the pump like my old one. Also like the LED display makes it very easy to read PSI and preset the pressure. Good tool!
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase of 2019
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it says it does. It will put .5psi more in the tire, but that's okay. In the time that I've owned this, it has paid for itself 5 times over. Being able to check and fill the tires cold is an absolute benefit, especially in the Las Vegas heat. No more driving around to find a gas station with a working air pump, and then giving them their 50 cents to a dollar for a few minutes of air to fill already warm tires. For where my 12V plug is, and the size of my car, a longer cord length would be nice, but I'm reaching the tires and getting the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C

customer_reviews.title: Convenient/light weight tire inflator that works
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 yr old car and from time to time would have to go to the gas station for low tire pressure. I finally bought a portable tire inflator. This product is easy to set up. I'm able to reach all 4 of my tires and inflates my wheels quickly. The machine is a tad loud but probably because it has a lot of power in it. The tire inflator is light weight and easy to store in the trunk of my car. I do wish it came with a little carry bag or case.
customer_reviews.author: I'm J. :)

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy a total waste of money with no refund
customer_reviews.text: This is got to be the worst piece of junk yet barely worked for 5 minutes they have a sticker on it please don't leave a review email us will give you your money back which is a lie keep away from this!
customer_reviews.author: Bud

customer_reviews.title: I Wish I Bought this Sooner
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this old air compressor that needs a traditional outlet for power for so long, and you also have to monitor the tire pressure yourself. This thing is so easy to use. You plug it into your 12v plug in your car, run the cord through the door/window, attach to your tire, select the proper tire pressure and it does the rest for you. The numbers are bright and easy to see during the day. I just keep it in my trunk and its always ready to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and add a little air
customer_reviews.text: A few weeks ago I found myself in a pickle when my tire pressure light came on. The weather had changed drastically and I was thankful that this happened during the daylight hours when I could go to a tire store. I don’t want to risk that situation again. So, I ordered this so I am better prepared. I was pleased that the instruction booklet was easy to follow as I tend to feel overwhelmed when it comes to ‘car stuff’. The display was bright and it was easy to program. I was able to easily check my tires and add a little air to one of my tires that was low.
customer_reviews.author: Fitnessgal

customer_reviews.title: Great for small vehicles, not for larger trucks
customer_reviews.text: Great if you have a car or small truck. Can easily fill up those tires. I have a F250, running 60 PSI in the front and 65 in the back. This thing struggles hard and has started to smoke when filling up those tires. Incredibly hot to the touch and makes me not feel safe using it. Accuracy is good at low PSI or when you first start using it. First 2 tires on my truck the PSI was spot on. Third was off by 2-3 PSI the last tire was off by 5. If you only have a small car or truck this is a great product but it’s not suited for tires requiring higher PSI.
customer_reviews.author: Frasern1

customer_reviews.title: This works just as they said it would!
customer_reviews.text: I got this after getting fed up with the lack of air hoses at gas stations that work. It was reasonable and the digital control was a nice touch. I don't have to babysit pumping my tires anymore. nIt automatically shuts off when it's done! Yeah it's great, It's cheap and easy to use. I do not have to babysit the pump it stops when the tire reaches the right pressure. This is really good for traveling and when you cannot find a place to pump up your tires. It can be used with bicycles and other things that need to be pumped up
customer_reviews.author: DJan

customer_reviews.title: Happy my old air pump died!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. I am amazed that you can set the pressure on the digital screen and then turn this on and it will automatically fill up the air to the desired pressure! This makes filling up car air tires so much easier, especially when the temperature is so hot outside. The noise is not as loud as my older one that died and while it does not come with a carrying case, the air cord tucks inside and the charging cord is very long and is able to be wrapped up. I may order another for my wife. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ajay Ahuja

customer_reviews.title: Quick and efficient!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a mechanical tire inflator before, but this little unit works a treat. It's very quick inflating a nearly flat wagon tire to 30 psi in less than a minute. It's not too noisy and is simple to use so long as the steps are followed. The cord might be a tad longer, but it manages to do the job. I haven't tried it yet in winter cold, which is one of the reasons I bought it; hopefully it will word just as well in cold as it does in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: D.L.Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Great accessaory for your trunk
customer_reviews.text: I liked the tire pressure pump immediately as I removed it from its shipping box. It was very well packed and came without a scratch on it. It was extremely easy to use and the auto shutoff when the set tire pressure was reached was a great capability. The digital gauge was accurate and made me realize what I had been missing with my old analog tire pressure gauge pump, which was hard to see and very inaccurate. With all the new cars now not even coming with a donut spare this tire pressure gauge is a must to have in the trunk. Thanks for creating this now essential tool to keep in my car’s trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Cpt Querk

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say that I am incredibly glad I stumbled upon this item because it works so well! I like the idea of having a portable tire inflator because I was once stranded in the middle of nowhere for a few hours and that was incredibly terrifying. However, I no longer feel paranoid while driving alone at nighttime as I am able to top off the air in my tire when it seems to be low. Not to mention, this product is very light & compact. Loved it so much that I got my mom and sister one as well. Highly recommended! =)
customer_reviews.author: Tina T.

customer_reviews.title: LIFETIME REPLACEMENT WARRANTY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: There's a bunch of similar tire inflators on Amazon that get great reviews but I haven't found another one with such a fantastic warranty! Works so well and is so easy to use that I immediately bought one for my daughter too! So much easier than dragging out my compressor, or having to pay to use the air at a gas station AND you can keep it in your truck to use anywhere. My trucks tires also seem to go low in the middle of winter and it will be so much better to plug this in and go inside where it's warm while this thing fills up my tires
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Wow, so convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This air compressor is amazing. It is so convenient with a built in digital gauge. I check all my tires about every month to make sure they are still holding correct pressure. This tire inflator makes the job so much faster. The power cord is long enough to reach front and back of the vehicle. The compressor automatically stops once it gets to your desired psi. The digital gauge is pretty accurate compares to my handheld gauge. Great product overall all.
customer_reviews.author: nathen van

customer_reviews.title: Don't!
customer_reviews.text: Thank heavens for the built in light, cause the rest just doesn't work. The Guage is useless, hard to read and something is off. Couldn't get mine to fill a bike tire. Pretty much useless, to me. Instructions say, "set the pressure and go...". Yeah right, give that a try...
customer_reviews.author: PcW

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The VACLIFE 12V Car Air Compressor Tire Inflator is amazing and very easy to use. All you have to do is plug the wire into the car cigarette lighter and set the compressor to the desired pressure, easy to see on the digital display, and then the hose that has the nozzle that connects to the car tire, bike or inflatable balls, mattress air, pool, etc. and automatically shuts off when inflated to desired pressure. It has an LED light and includes various accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Really compact and great for car tires
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a compact air compressor that could fit below the seats of my car. This air compressor is really compact and fitted was just the size to fit below my seat. I bought a tire pressure gauge just to be on the safe side and was amazed that the error between this machine and gauge was next to nothing/zero. With this air compressor you could change the unit from psi to Pascals and set the required pressure and it will stop when the pressure is achieved. It is truly a nice equipment to have at all times.
customer_reviews.author: amazonist

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Pumped up two cars worth of tires: 45 psi and 36 psi. An independent measure of the 36 psi tires showed one at 35 psi and three at 37 psi. As such things go, that's accurate in my book. And the pump is intuitive and easy to use. The clip on to the valve stem is a plus as it makes going from tire to tire much easier than the screw on type. I did eight tires in a row and had no problems at all. The hose got mildly warm, but not hot. Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: eyeonthescreen

customer_reviews.title: Good little air compressor, easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this purchase. It is very easy to operate. I plug the unit into the cigarette lighter. I turn on the unit and set my desired air pressure. I connect to my tire and turn on the machine. It pumps up the tire and automatically stops. I would recommend buying it. The power button does not pop back out when it automatically stops at the desired pressure. You have to manually press the button to the off position before you can turn on again. No other issues.
customer_reviews.author: lliko-usa

customer_reviews.title: Love this little thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this air compressor. Cord is long enough to reach every tire, easy to use, small size is great. This has helped me several times since purchasing it as I had a slow leak in my tire. Would highly recommend and have brought a few for Xmas gift. It's one of those gifts that you don't really appreciate until you need it and then are so glad you have. I am a senior woman and this couldn't be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: It inflates the tires fast.
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this air compressor. It has a long cord and I can reach all four of my tires. It has a bright light that helps me see at night. It also has nozzles to help me inflate balls and mattresses. It is very lightweight. It has an automatic stop at the psi you need. I like to inflate all my tires to 37 psi. You can't getter a better deal for an air compressor at this price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Power cord dangles from the unit at all time, no compartment door. Overall construction and accessories are cheap plastic and the unit does not look like it would survive real use. Returned promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Life savings product i ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: Got VacLife air compressor. First of all it looks really nice. Unlike other cheap air compressor. Its heavy. Exactly what you see on the product description. I started pump air on my car, it took a minutes to fill up 35psi from 25psi, like the heavy duty compressor. Cord length is fair enough to reach out to all 4 wheels. Has a small led lights for blackout when you are at night ride. Literally life savings products you would have it on your trunk. I would recommend to other.
customer_reviews.author: Fakhrul Islam

customer_reviews.title: Good little tire inflator
customer_reviews.text: The tire inflator is great for causal and also emergency use. I had a nail stuck in one of my tires and the pressure dropped to 11 psi. I took this out and pumped it back up to 30 psi in a few minutes, which was enough to get me to a service center. I will always keep it in the trunk. Pros Compact, convenient(runs on car 12 volt), has an LED? Does the job Cons Not as intuitive to use or maybe I'm dumb. Set your pressure first then turn it on. Apparently it needs to cool down if you use it too long, but I've never had to since I only used it casually.
customer_reviews.author: Zane

customer_reviews.title: Worth buy
customer_reviews.text: It is a good quality and effective compressor that comes with a lifetime warranty. I used it for my Mazda cx-9 and it should fit for every car that has 12v cigarette port. The cord is 11ft and long enough to inflate the front and rear tires comfortably.It took around 5 minutes to inflate the rear tire from 24psi to 33psi. Also, it comes with additional nozzle that fits for air mattress, volleyball, and balloons. The product has a digital display and it is small to store in our car. The measurement is accurate and the readings are consistent. Price is a little less when compared to similar models on the market. Worth buy considering its quality and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Gokul

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I was expecting !
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this would take too much space in the car - its not as large as the picture would suggest. It's light plastic, but light weight, so shouldn't be an issue. The cord is plenty long. The light, functional. Easy to use and the ability to preset the desired PSI is great. The attachments are also much appreciated. All in all, happy with my purchase and expect it to hold up over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Jing W.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, lightweight and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Just set the VacLife to the tire pressure you want and fill all of your tires in a matter of minutes. No separate tire gauge needed to check accuracy or to misplace. LED built in flashlight is bright and useful. The extra long cord means you can reach all of your tires without having to unplug it and plug it in again. Lightweight, compact and easy to use. Competitively priced. I thoroughly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: Had the device for half a year now, and used it only twice: first time pumping a ball (worked great) and second time pumping my tires (from 18psi to 41psi). During the time I was pumping my tires, I tried to increase my tires up to 42 psi, when I noticed the power went out on the device. Thought it was my car or my car's outlet, but it turned out that the device just died.. Not sure what happened, but I can't really recomemend this if it stops working after only using it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Hana Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and performance
customer_reviews.text: This unit is compact with a long cord perfect for reaching all for tires of my truck. Be careful not to run it too long because it gets hot and the motor needs to cool before damage can occur. I inflated all my tires to the recommended pressure, but the internal sensor was 2 lbs under on one of the rear tires. Not sure if the unit is a bit off in calibration or the sensor or if tire was leaking, Getting checked today.
customer_reviews.author: Loud and Clear

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement pump!
customer_reviews.text: I received my VACLIFE tire inflator and I think it is much better than the last product I tried. The last one wasn't as stable as this one and the inflation hose was not long enough. It worked but when it broke I was more informed as to what I was looking for. This VACLIFE inflator it plenty long enough and stores smartly when not in use. I would recommend this to anyone in need or as an extra piece for their emergency car kit...Great for all in the family and even has adapters for beach items!!!
customer_reviews.author: Byron D.

customer_reviews.title: I keep it as a spare for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in my garage as an emergency product and to occasionally bump my tires up when the weather gets colder. It's on par for what I've used in the past from other vendors. Some neat features include a handy led light so you can see what you're doing in the dark and a storage area for your air cord so it's not just dangling out. You set your tire pressures and the unit runs until it gets to that target. Measures within 1psi so good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Smart buy! You'll be glad you have it.
customer_reviews.text: This has saved me many times from ending up on the side of the road or being late to work due to low tire pressure. Highly recommend. I've had it for a couple months now and have used it many times. It's very easy to use and the look is pretty cool. I like the color accent as well. It looks more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Catkeeper88

customer_reviews.title: Great product especially for the $$
customer_reviews.text: So annoying when the tire needs air light comes on. Last trip to station to get air $1.50. Okay so it's $1.50 but they only want to take your credit card.... hmmmmm not thrilled about that swipe. I got this for those days, bike tires and pool floats. It comes with all the gizmos needed to add air to whatever needed. Super easy to use, turn on, walk away, shuts off when it reaches whatever setting you use.
customer_reviews.author: Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Air Pmp
customer_reviews.text: It quickly airs up a low tire. I really like that I can set it and forget it with the auto-shutoff. Small, but powerful. The quick disconnect makes it easy to use. I've had other quick disconnect pumps that stick when you try to disconnect them, but this one works perfectly. I'm not rating the light because a light for a tire pump is less than worthless to me. That's just me, though. I have flashlights for that.
customer_reviews.author: T. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Compact and cool looking air compressor!
customer_reviews.text: At first receiving the air compressor it was smaller than I thought it would be. It has a compact and modern look. The cord for the adapter is longer than most air pumps which is welcomed. The time to pump from 17 psi to 34 psi took around 4 minutes which is good for this size. Noise level and vibration is typical for this pump. Overall a nice pump to get you out flat tire trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy, intuitive car tire inflator
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new Vaclife car air compressor and immediately used it to adjust pressure of all five tires (spare included) on both my vehicles. Very intuitive controls and the choice of pressure scales should please everyone. It quickly filled each tire to the pressure I set and automatically shut off as advertised. It is easy to store and gives me the security of always being able to effortlessly keep my tires properly inflated. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use.
customer_reviews.text: This item seemed to be helpful when we first opened it and tried out the light, but the first time my husband needed to use it to put air in a tire it broke. I don’t recommend wasting your money.
customer_reviews.author: LAdybug

customer_reviews.title: Super useful
customer_reviews.text: I was at my cabin in the Sierras a couple months ago and it was very cold that night...when I came out to my car the following morning...my TPMS warning light was on and wasn't sure what the issue was....the cabin is off the grid and I had no easy power to access....without firing up our huge diesel generator....so plugged this little pump into my cigarette lighter/computer port and checked all my tires and pumped them up...and it worked perfectly....wish I had thought of this years ago. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: JBPENCO

customer_reviews.title: Great device to keep in the car!
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly as its described. I tested it out by pumping air into all my tires at 35 PSI (manufacturer's recommendation). Ironically, the basketball in my trunk was flat too. They included a tip to allow me to fill up the air for that as well. The length of the cord is plenty too. I was able to maneuver to all four tires with ease as well. I think the built-in light flashlight was great too but at this point, I think it's just the cherry on top. I think with this device, jumper cables, med kit, road flares, and a toolbox, I think I have everything I need in the event of an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, super reliable.
customer_reviews.text: This pump is very easy to use as compared to the pumps you find at gas stations. I’ve been using it for a few months now and it hasn’t failed me a single time. I love the auto shutoff function which engages as soon as your desired air pressure is reached in the tire. The nozzle fits and locks on the tire’s valves very easily and securely. I have used this pump for a Honda Pilot and Prius 2. It has worked equally effectively both times. I also love that it comes with a sore fuse in case you blow the original one. Do follow the instructions and it’s super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 40 mins of use
customer_reviews.text: I was filling up a 35Psi tire. Filled up the first one OK but halfway during the second one the compressor started sputtering and some white smoke came out the back of it. Went to try it again an hour later and still the same sputtering and wouldn't fill tire up.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a perfect price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tire inflator to keep in our truck which frequently tows a 33' camper. We wanted peace of mind when traveling long distances but also have to consider storage space. The VacLife tire inflator checks off both boxes since it's extremely small and fits under the truck seat, but it also worked flawlessly when topping off tire pressure in our vehicles and kids' bikes. Plus at this price you can afford to keep one in every vehicle which we plan on doing.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Well made and Very Handy!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product is lightweight, a bright color, has stickers on it reminding you all of the detailed steps to using it, has a light for if you have to air up the car tire at night on the road, and has a compartment to put the cord. Will update with use! UPDATE: I have aired up all of my tires, and it was very fast, and very efficient! The device was quiet, and performed well. As far as I can tell, this thing is a sweet deal!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Moore

product_meta.title: VacLife Air Compressor Tire Inflator, DC 12V Portable Air Compressor for Car Tires, Auto Tire Pump with LED Light, Digital Air Pump for Car Tires, Bicycles and Other Inflatables
feature_bullets: [FAST INFLATING SPEED & EASY TO USE] This auto tire air compressor can inflate your standard car tire fastest in seconds. Simply plug it into the 12V power outlet in your car and attach the hose to the tire you wish to inflate. You can just flip the switch and the car air compressor will do all the work for you.

[AUTO SHUT OFF] This car air pump uses simple and useful technology. You can preset the pressure you expect, and when the inflator tire reaches the desired pressure, the car air compressor will automatically turn off. So, you do not have to worry about over inflating or low tire pressure anymore. VacLife will convoy your safety all the way.

[LED LIGHTING & 13 FEET-LONG RANGE] Our electric air pump comes with the LED light can help you to inflate your tire AT NIGHT. Besides, the 13 ft power cable is long enough for you to reach the front and rear tire with ease. A long cable eliminates the need to unplug it each time you switch from one tire to the next.

[MULTI-PURPOSE with 4 Additional Nozzles] Our tire pump’s 13ft long power cord and 4 additional nozzles allow you to reach all tires of your car, bike, motor, ATV, compact or midsize Sedan SUV, etc. Also, sports equipment and inflatables adaptors included, makes it perfect for your air mattress, inflatable boats, balls and other inflatables.
[BEST SERVICE] Get a full refund or a replacement FOR LIFE under your normal use. Please contact us ASAP if there are any problems.

specifications.Model: DC 12V Portable Air Compressor for Car Tires, Auto Tire Pump with LED Light, Digital
specifications.Special Features: Portable, DC 12V, Digital, Easy to use, Lamp
